name: ROOM APPLELI
description:
This is a room that built based on Apple Li's own living room. The room has basically a window, a bookshelf, a table, and a carpet. The whole picture is in a cyber style which is composed with the color and mainly blue and purple. 

Devlog:  After reading “The Door Problem”, it surprised me that there are a huge number of roles in the game industry. For me, there are plenty of roles that are very interesting, such as creative director, concept artist, writer, and QA tester. I have no idea how exactly each role works in the game industry. However, maybe concept artists sound better since the artist can design how things look like in games. There is more creativity in this work. Also, I think the QA tester is an interesting but somehow boring job as well. Testing problems for a game is extremely important and difficult. Sometimes, bugs are not obvious to find. Therefore, I think QA testers play a crucial role.
